security: The file contains sources and methods which are exempt from release. Deletion mentioned is 'Sources and methods'.
summary: This is a review of Thomas B. CASASIN's personnel file, conducted by House Select Committee on Assassinations staff members at CIA Headquarters, covering the period from 1955-1962, noting it contains pertinent information/documents from the file.
summary_one_paragraph: In 1978, Betsy Wolf, a staff member of the House Select Committee on Assassinations, reviewed Thomas B. CASASIN's personnel file at CIA Headquarters. The file includes documents and information pertaining to CASASIN's CIA employment from 1955 to 1962, with a note indicating that CASASIN went overseas in mid-1962. The review process involved evaluation of materials within the file, with specific deletions made to protect sources and methods. No documents were copied or removed during the review.
title: Personnel file: Thomas B. CASASIN
recipient: House Select Committee on Assassinations Staff Members
